name: 68 Whiskey
description:
Welcome Medics!

Take a step back in history and relive the life of a combat medic. 

This is a game where you help rescue fallen soldiers and get them ready to go home or back into the fight!

||Precursor||

Please play in fullscreen for a more optimal experience. (Our UI didn't like the final build)

Controls: 

WASD to walk

1. Bandage

2. Morphine

3. Splint

4. Shovel

Premise:

Around the map there are random soldiers spawned that you must heal using the tools provided. Look for them all to try and win the game!

Thank you for playing our first game jam game.
